params._tokenDistributor: address of the token distributor contract

deposit(uint256,bool).details: There is a limit of 1 LOOKS per deposit to prevent potential manipulation of current shares

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRewards(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by owner. Owner is meant to be another smart contract.

calculatePendingRewards(address).notice: Calculate pending rewards (WETH) for a user

calculateSharePriceInLOOKS().notice: Calculate price of one share (in LOOKS token) Share price is expressed times 1e18

calculateSharesValueInLOOKS(address).notice: Calculate value of LOOKS for a user given a number of shares owned

deposit(uint256,bool).notice: Deposit staked tokens (and collect reward tokens if requested)

harvest().notice: Harvest reward tokens that are pending

lastRewardBlock().notice: Return last block where trading rewards were distributed

updateRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Update the reward per block (in rewardToken)

withdraw(uint256,bool).notice: Withdraw staked tokens (and collect reward tokens if requested)

withdrawAll(bool).notice: Withdraw all staked tokens (and collect reward tokens if requested)

documentation.text: @notice Harvest reward tokens that are pending

arguments.value: Withdraw: Shares equal to 0 or larger than user shares
